page.title: 09ANNUAL EVENTS IN YATTON
page.content: In May there is a music festival week, with concerts in the church. In June Yatton Festival week starts with Yatton Infants School carnival and fancy dress parade. During Festival week there are rounders and football matches between teams from different streets in Yatton. Another regular event is the Yatton Junior School fete with various entertainments such as country dancing. During the summer holidays the local churches arrange holiday clubs to keep children busy and amused.The Horticultural Society holds its annual Summer show in a big marquee where plants, flowers, fruit, vegetables and various crafts are displayed. In November there are bonfires and firework displays organised by the Infants School and the Cadbury Country Club.
